author: Special Correspondent
text:
Alleging that their 20-year-old son who worked as rig operator in Andhra Pradesh was beaten that led to his death later, parents refused to receive the body after a post mortem at Government Mohan Kumaramangalam Medical College Hospital here on Friday.

M. Manoj alias Vignesh of Namagiripettai was working in Kadapa district. Recently he returned home and said he was unwell. He underwent treatment at hospitals. Finally he was admitted to Salem GH on February 14. He died on February 17. His parents took his body home. On Thursday they said he was treated as a bonded labour at work place and beaten by the employer. – Special Correspondent
title: Foul play suspected in youth’s death
